simzombie.engine.graph
Class Plot

java.lang.Object
  simzombie.engine.graph.Plot

public class Plot
extends java.lang.Object

Contains basic information about a plot (data series, x and y locations, colour)

Since:
2011-10-28

Nested Class Summary
static class Plot.PlotComparator
          Compares a plot based on the X axis alone This allows us to organise our plots from left to right, for display purposes

Constructs a plot with a given name, x location, y location and colour

Parameters:
name - Name of the data series this plot point belongs to
xaxis - Position of this plot on the x axis
yaxis - Position of this plot on the y axis
color - Colour of this plot
